meanings.definition: A person who intrigues or plots
meanings.sent1: The intrigant whispered secrets to gain power.
meanings.sent2: The group suspected the intrigant of causing trouble.
meanings.sent3: The clever intrigant tricked everyone with a fake treasure map.
meanings.sent4: She was an intrigant weaving a web of deception.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious intrigant left a trail of clues for the detectives.

meanings.sent1: The novel had an intrigant plot that kept readers guessing.
meanings.sent2: The intrigant behavior of the character made the story exciting.
meanings.sent3: The party had an intrigant theme with hidden surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her smile held an intrigant charm that captivated everyone.
meanings.sent5: The old mansion had an intrigant atmosphere, full of secrets.
